title: Three years of war push Russia’s inflation past 10 per cent
description:
Though the rate has slowed significantly after rising interest rates, Russia’s current inflation remains way over its target of 4 per cent

Given the ongoing three-year conflict with Ukraine and countless sanctions by the West, Russian citizens have fallen victim to erratic prices, with inflation no...
